FastReader Chrome Extension

Enhance your reading speed and focus with the FastReader Chrome Extension! This innovative tool presents individual words in a flashed sequence, allowing you to read at speeds of up to 450 words per minute. Whether you're looking to boost your reading efficiency or seeking assistance with concentration, FastReader is designed to cater to your needs.

Key Features:

    Speed Reading: Read at accelerated speeds by flashing individual words in sequence.
    Customizable Settings: Adjust speed and font size to tailor your reading experience.
    Assistive Functionality: Designed to aid individuals with ADHD in improving concentration and focus.

How to Use:

    Install the extension in your Chrome browser.
    Paste the text you want to read into the provided textarea.
    Customize settings such as reading speed and font size.
    Click the "Run" button to start the flash reading experience.
